keyMoments.title: Kaku Meets the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Kaku introduces himself as a foreman from Galley-La Company and agrees to assess the Going Merry's condition for repairs. His distinctive square nose is immediately noted by the crew.
keyMoments.significance: First formal introduction of Kaku to the Straw Hats, beginning his role in evaluating their ship and establishing his cover as a shipwright.
keyMoments.quote: I'll come check out your ship right away!

relationships.description: Kaku works under Iceburg as one of the foremen at Galley-La Company.

evolutionMoments.description: Kaku is introduced as one of Iceburg's trusted Galley-La foremen.

reveals.information: Foreman at Galley-La Company Dock One, specializing in mechanics, diagnostics, and house calls
Has a distinctive square nose similar to Usopp's long nose

keyMoments.title: Meeting Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Nami, and Usopp formally meet Iceburg, the mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company. He greets them casually despite knowing they are pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First direct interaction between the Straw Hats and Iceburg, establishing him as a key figure in Water 7 who will be central to the arc's conflict.
keyMoments.quote: Oh my, pirates? Welcome to Water 7.

relationships.description: Kalifa serves as Iceburg's secretary, accompanying him and managing his schedule.

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa is shown working as Iceburg's loyal and professional secretary.

reveals.information: Mayor of Water 7 and President of Galley-La Company
Casual and relaxed demeanor despite his important positions, often says 'Oh my'

keyMoments.title: Kalifa Accompanies Iceburg
keyMoments.description: Kalifa appears as Iceburg's secretary, demonstrating her professional and loyal demeanor as she accompanies the mayor.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kalifa's role as Iceburg's secretary and her position within the Galley-La Company hierarchy.

relationships.description: Kalifa serves as Iceburg's secretary with apparent fierce loyalty.

evolutionMoments.description: Kalifa is shown accompanying Iceburg as his secretary.

reveals.information: Secretary to Iceburg, mayor of Water 7 and president of Galley-La Company
Tall, slim woman with blue eyes, glasses, and strawberry-blonde hair

keyMoments.title: Franky Family Confrontation
keyMoments.description: Zambai leads members of the Franky Family in confronting Zoro, revealing their identity and attempting to intimidate the swordsman.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Franky Family as antagonists and begins their conflict with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Stealing the Straw Hats' Money
keyMoments.description: Zambai and other Franky Family members successfully steal two suitcases containing 200 million beli while Luffy is distracted.
keyMoments.significance: This theft becomes a catalyst for major events in the Water 7 Arc.

keyMoments.title: Defeating the Franky Family
keyMoments.description: Zoro easily defeats multiple members of the Franky Family who attempted to confront him, demonstrating the vast gap in their combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Zoro's strength and establishes that the Franky Family is no match for the Straw Hats in direct combat.

keyMoments.title: Robin Follows Mysterious Figure
keyMoments.description: Robin is spotted following a mysterious masked figure through Water 7. When Sanji tries to follow, both Robin and the figure have vanished.
keyMoments.significance: First hint at Robin's secret involvement with CP9 and foreshadows her later disappearance from the crew.

reveals.information: Robin is secretly meeting with unknown individuals, hidden from her crewmates
